availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander A. Harvey (Jefferson County, KY, resident)

body.p: Jefferson County, KY, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Ann Porter Harvey in Bracken County, Kentucky, on May 11, 1835. Father of D. A. Harvey, John Gorin Harvey, J. L. Harvey, George W. Harvey, Emily Harvey, James A. Harvey, and Rhoda Harvey. Married to Martha A. Jones Harvey in Louisville on October 28, 1862. Stepfather of Belle Jones, Cyrus Jones, and Mattie Jones. Resident of Allen County in 1850. Resident of Louisville in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, p. 108B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 6, p. 604A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, 1766-1878, Film #000851644, p. 22.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, 1860-1867, Film #000482709.
"Alexander Albert Harvey (unknown-1885)," Find A Grave, Memorial #154617995, accessed March 7, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/154617995.
